Condition 2: We compare two mixtures - one consisting of half (1/2) pound of almonds combined with one third (1/3) pound of walnuts against another made up of only fifth (1/5) pounds of almonds mixed with same amount (1/3) pound of walnuts. Question: Which mixture—the first or second—is more expensive when considering both types of nuts? Additionally, calculate precisely how much more expensive it is compared to the other option.<|end_of_document|> To determine which nut mix would be more expensive based on given prices, we must perform calculations using conditional statements as follows:

1.subquestion: Calculate the cost per pound for almonds within both mixtures.
